detectors.description:
BASEDPool1.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BASEDPool1.sol#850-865) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(duration) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BASEDPool1.sol#855)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BASEDPool1.sol#858)
